questions.label: Check if the persons providing the information is not the patient
Have you travelled within the last 14 days domestically?
If yes, Date of travel to (DUPLICATED)
Have you travelled within the last 14 days internationally?
If yes, Date of travel to (DUPLICATED)

answers.label: to be updated with Nigeria concept

questions.label: In the past 14 days, have you had contact with anyone with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 (corona/coronavirus)?
If yes, Dates of last contact
For each occupation, please specify location or facility
Is the close contact a Health Care Worker?
Direct physical contact with a confirmed case (e.g hands-on physical contact)
Has the HCW had a prolonged face-to-face contact (≥15 minutes) with a symptomatic confirmed case in the health facility
If yes, what type of protective equipment was used by the Health Care Worker?

answers.label: NIOSH Certified N95 or An EU standard FFP2

questions.label: Was the contact present while any aerosol generating procedures took place
Was the contact wearing any type of mask at this/these procedures

answers.label: NIOSH Certified N95 or An EU standard FFP2

questions.label: Has the contact experienced any respiratory symptoms (Sore throat, cough, running nose, shortness of breath) in the period up to 10 days after last contact or until the present date, whichever is the earliest
Date and time of first symptom onset

sections.label: Outcome/status of contact (only complete if contact has been ill or currently ill)

questions.label: if recovered specify the date symptom resolved
if yes specify date of deaths
If dead, contribution of 2019-nCoV to death
If yes, results of post-mortem's report where available
If dead, cause of death on the Death certificate (specify)
